Product is light, suitable for gaming and convenient without the worry of cable management.
The mouse also comes with Logitech sticker, cable to charge, dongle as seen in Logitech main website
Additionally, the casing really nice and all products are good quality

Well wrapping..fast delivery..very good deal as i purchase during 7.7 only rm579 with 10% cashback..really worth it n happy to grab white color..furthermore got free hardcase!! hope it will not fade or have black marking like my glorious model d minus
